name: Anthony Goldstein
personality: Anthony was a very friendly and good-natured individual,[4] who was willing to disobey and risk being punished by Dolores Umbridge in opposition to her tyranny over Hogwarts, as a devoted member of Dumbledore's Army. He was also very courageous and determined, as he bravely fought against the Death Eaters in the Battle of Hogwarts along with most of his friends and fellow students to defend his school, and even managed to survive the battle, showing him to have been a very skilled wizard indeed.

Harry Potter: "What!? This is supposed to be secret."
Anthony: "It's all right. I heard it from Ernie, who heard it from Neville."
Harry Potter: "We'll see you there then, yeah?"

description: Anthony Goldstein (b. 1980) was a half-blood[2] wizard who began attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in 1991. He was Sorted into Ravenclaw house. In his fifth year he was selected as one of his House's prefects[3] and joined Dumbledore's Army, an organisation taught and lead by Harry Potter.[8] Anthony later fought beside fellow D.A. members in the Battle of Hogwarts the last battle of the Second Wizarding War.
